title: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces, Build 200110251.
OB: When the tab character in the first line is replaced with spaces so that the two lines are visually indented the same, and then ShiftLeft is executed, the text moves. It is unclear how this behavior is specified, but in the first scenario, it seems like the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left at least to the space character, effectively removing the tab. It is confusing if there is a stray space since it is unclear why the text won't shift.
